name: Brainsss
description:
★Over 150,000 downloads for Brainsss! 150,000 people addicted to Brainsss can't be wrong!★

★OVER 8million humans converted★

The critically acclaimed breakthrough new game where YOU play as the zombie swarm, rounding up mankind to join your side.
Featured Editor's Choice in the App Store worldwide.

TouchArcade 4 ½ out of 5 ★'s!

iFanzine.com 4 ½ out of 5 ★'s!

"EPIC" - 148Apps.com

"It's a beautifully implemented squad-based title" - iFanzine.com

"one of the most intellegent iOS zombie game so far" - best10apps.com

"Vibrant, loveable aesthetic" - gamezebo.com

"Brainsss is not your typical zombie game, in fact it is far from that" - approc.com

"Engaging mixture of strategy and tactile play" - gamezebo.com

"If you're a fan of strategy games or zombies, give Brainsss a try" - appadvice.com



Control multiple groups of zombies and guide them to victory with touch controls. Trap, chase, intimidate, and ultimately, convert those annoying humans.

Build a massive swarm of zombies and trash the human defenses. Careful some of the humans will fight back!

Unlock unique Hero zombies to powerup your zombie swarm with bonuses and special abilities.

Play through more than 70 amazing, beautiful levels that include suburbia, hospitals, parks, airports, cities, and offices, to name a few.

Use your cunning, strategy, and on the fly decision making to catch them all!

Newly added Casual mode allows for unique one touch play.

Completely optional In-App-Purchase's - not at all required to complete the game with 3 stars on every level.

♥ Universal app - 1 purchase for all your devices ♥

» 20 Unlockable Heroes
» Unique action RTS gameplay
» 2 game modes (Casual/Strategy)
» Multiple Zoom levels though simple pinch interface
» 90+ achievements
» iCloud Support
» New iPad 3 retina GUI
» Left Handed support
» Top-down view mode available for the RTS players
» Group Save and Recall via the new Grouping toolbar
» Game Speed can be set to 3 settings (Slower, Normal and Faster)
» Improved and more responsive controls
» Optimized levels for dramatically faster loading
» Brainsss Bucks now appear as random drops from humans
» Extensive new help system
» 20 Unlockable Comics
» Improved Zombie A.I.
» Crazy Golf Carts!!
